properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO ,MEM_NAME ,MEM_ID ,MEM_PWD ,PHONE ,ADDRESS ,EMAIL ,MEM_GRADE ,STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET ADDRESS = ? ,PHONE = ? ,EMAIL = ? ,MEM_GRADE = ? ,STATUS = ? WHERE MEM_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEM_NO = ?

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_GRADE , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , GENDER , AGE , NICKNAME , EMAIL , PHONE , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , QUITREASON FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT REPORT_NO ,REPORTER ,SUSPECT ,REPORT_CONTENT ,REPORT_DATE ,RESULT FROM REPORT ORDER BY REPORT_NO
